original_text: I saw that there was a stone base all around the temple. The side rooms stood on this base as their foundation. It was 3 metres high. 9-
korean_text: 내가 보니 성전 삼면의 지대 곧 모든 골방 밑 지대의 높이는 한 장대 곧 큰 자로 여섯 척인데

sentences.original_text: I saw that there was a stone base
The side rooms stood on this base
sentences.korean_translation: 곁방들이 이 받침대 위에 서 있었다
